soft_skills_des: As a developer, I have collaborated with multicultural and multidisciplinary teams, both locally and remotely. I've gained strong communication skills through working directly with clients and understanding their technical and business needs.
other_tech: I have also worked with other technologies that are not part of my daily stack but with which I have some experience, such as Java, Cobol, Python, and SQL/NoSQL databases.
pre_backend: I have experience building and maintaining backend platforms and working with databases, especially using .NET Core, AWS Lambda functions, and MongoDB.
main_skills: My main skills are in web development, especially frontend. I have solid experience with: Angular, Vue, and .NET Core.
complementary_cont: I also have experience with writing structured content in both English and Spanish, which helps in documenting code, writing clear specifications, and communicating ideas effectively in technical environments.
mindshop_essay: I'm studying philosophy to improve my argumentative and writing skills. You can read one of my philosophy essays published in Mindshop
